title: Three heated pools (one with saltwater), Vaulted ceilings, Heat & A/C
neighborhood: 6300 Green Valley Circle, Culver City, CA
posting_body: ['Welcome to The Meadows Apartment Homes, a garden-style gated community conveniently located in the West Los Angeles neighborhood of Culver City, CA.', 'The apartments for rent at The Meadows are surrounded by lush greenery, mature vegetation, gorgeous courtyards, winding pathways, and babbling brooks.', 'When you step inside The Meadows Apartment Homes, its serene and peaceful atmosphere will transport you to a world far away from the hustle and bustle of Culver City.', 'Our convenient location puts you within walking distance of the famous trendy Westfield Culver City Mall, a wide range of dining and shopping options, public transportation, and quick access to the 405 and 90 freeways.', 'Modern luxury, lush surroundings and convenient premium location-The Meadows Apartment Homes offers the best of both worlds.', '- Three heated pools (one with saltwater)', '- 24-Hour fitness center', '- Two indoor spas featuring saunas and jacuzzi', '- Outdoor spa', '- Night-lit tennis courts', '- Gas BBQ grills', '- Two-story clubhouse with complimentary coffee, tea and WiFi', '- Package lockers with 24-hour access', '- Reservable conference room with seating for 10', '- Rentable resident guest suites', '- Rentable private event space on weekends', '- Six on-site 24-hour laundry centers', '- Public transportation nearby', '- Minutes from Downtown Culver City', '- Walking Distance to Westfield Mall and Fox Hills Park', '- Professional on-site management team', '- Assigned parking with covered parking available', '- Fully gated community with 24-hour courtesy patrol', '- Dog and cat friendly (breed restrictions apply)', '- Flexible 3- to 12-month lease terms (additional fees may apply)', '- Spacious floor plan layouts', '- Wood burning fireplaces', '- Heat & A/C', '- Vaulted wood ceilings', '- In-home washer & dryer', '- Energy-efficient windows', '- Tile backsplash in kitchen', '- Vaulted ceilings', '- Wood-style plank flooring', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', 'Pricing is subject to change.', 'Call for details.']
